Text: Re YK litigation Cc I am not aware of any Enron entity considering the YK dispute resolution process you mentioned However as you may have heard a recent federal law and a Texas law have been passed imposing a moratorium on YK lawsuits for a certain number of months under certain conditions We are awaiting an analysis of the new laws from VE and will forward that to you as soon as we receive it Please call if you would to discuss this further Best regards Mike

Legal Risks Memo Cc Attached for your information is a memorandum outlining the potential legal risks associated with the PurchaseSale Agreements and associated Swap Agreements among ERAC and Seminole Transportation Gathering Inc and Seminole Canada Energy Company The transactions with the Canadian entity have been executed and we are working towards closing the transactions with the US entity within the next week Please call if you have any questions Mike EB DID FAX

Re Product Type Aprroval Needed US PlasticRGC Phy Fwd Cc no exception Mike EB DID FAX Chris Walker PM To Jeff nronXGate Susan nronXGate Bjorn nronXGate Mark CT John nron Michael A CT Tom nronXGate Anjali nronXGate John nronXGate Alexia nronXGate cc Lisa CT Stephanie CT Tana CT Karen CT Kelly nron Tara CT Dawn C CT Torrey CT Kevin NRON Melba CT Robert B CT Subject Product Type Aprroval Needed US PlasticRGC Phy Fwd Your approval is needed for the following new product type in Datamanager Please see the steps for approval below Thanks CW US PlasticRGC Phy Fwd A Transaction with Enron Petrochemicals Company a division of Enron Liquid Fuels Inc under which the Seller shall sell and the Buyer shall purchase at the Delivery Location specified below and at the specified quantitytolerance quality and price a stream of refinery grade propylene The stream shall include refinery grade propylene with minimum purity propylene a maximum of butanes and heavier a maximum of ethanes and lighter a maximum of ppm of sulfur copper strip test wi th propane as the remaining balance the Stream The quantity shall b e the volume submitted by Counterparty via the Website The term of the Transaction shall correspond to the dates set forth in th e Product description on the Website The transaction is for delivery via scheduled pipeline to Dynegy Storage Mont Belvieu Texas Title to and risk of loss of the product shall pass t o Buyer when the product enters the receiving inlet valve of the storage well The price shall be determined as follows a the price for contained Propylene shall be the price submitted by Counterparty via the Website and b the price for all other components shall be the Avg price for Liquefi ed Propane Gas published in the table entitled Mont Belvieu Spot Gas Liquids Prices under the heading NonTET Propane Any Current Month in the issue of Oil Price Information Service OPIS that reports prices effective for each month during the term of the Transaction The price is quoted in cents US per unit of measure which will be the Contractual Currency The volume quoted on the Website is in barrels for t he entire Stream The unit of measure against which the price is quoted for the entire Stream shall be as follows a contained propylene shall be quoted in cents per pound lb and b all other components shall be quoted in cents per gallon gal as specified in the OPIS publication described above STEPS FOR APPROVAL click the START button select PROGRAMS select TEST APPLICATIONS select ENRONONLINE CLUSTERPROD PROCEED WITH USUAL LOGINPASSWORD click the Enron Online Production Cluster START button select EnronOnLine this is the EOL Datamanager PROCEED WITH EOL LOGINPASSWORD click on the for EnronOnLine click on the for Product Types click on the for Awaiting Approval OR Partially Approved select the product requiring review as stated in email above Right mouse click on properties to view product setup TO APPROVE Right mouse click on Approved

Re Online GTCs for Enron Petrochemicals Company EPC Cc The defined term Commercial Term which is contained in the Apendix I to the EPC gtcs should have been modified to reflect the definitional changes made in Section of the gtcs Ill work with Nony to get it corrected To Nony CT cc Alan CT Harry M CT Janice R CT Michael A CT Subject Re Online GTCs for Enron Petrochemicals Company EPC I have gone ahead and forwarded this and the ECFC version to the EOL people to be uploaded I do have a concern though that I wanted to ask you about These GTCs use the defined term Commercial Term which is defined as follows Commercial Terms means that part of this Agreement confirming in writing the specific terms of a Transaction which may be in any form adequate at law that is issued in connection with a Transaction We have taken the position in our other EOL trading that the transaction is complete and binding from the time we accept the counterpartys offer over the system by reference to the GTC the numbers submitted by the counterparty usually volume and price and the Long Description Weve gone to some lengths to make sure that the combination of GTC website numbers and Long Description contain all of the necessary terms Its not clear to me that we intend the website numbers and Long Description to satisfy the definition of Commercial Terms Are these transactions not intended to be binding until the confirmation is signed Any thoughts on this Nony Flores PM To Mark CT cc Alan CT Harry M CT Janice R CT Michael A CT Dale CT Steven M CT Subject Online GTCs for Enron Petrochemicals Company EPC Mark Last week Dale Neuner was requested to add four new commodities to online trading and Mike Robison and Steve Elliott have reviewed and approved the long descriptions for benzene mixed xylene toluene and methanol We have also finalized the form of GTCs for EPC who trades benzene xylene and toluene and are forwarding them to you for further distribution Note GTCs for Enron Clean Fuels Company who trades methanol will follow on Wednesday Thanks Nony Flores Ext
Re FOUR NEW PRODUCTS REQUIRING YOUR APPROVALA Robison EB DID FAX

Attached Files Cc Travis Attached is the proposed form of linking agreement for both DealBench and EOL Please let us have your comments Thanks Mike EB DID FAX Forwarded by Michael A RobisonHOUECT on PM Harvey Dean PM To Stockbridge Edward T Alderden Emily Dobin Nora Enron Douglas S Friedman Email Funk Brenda Enron John Viverito Klein Jason M Robison Email Nazro Phillips Rhett Jackson Email Suresh Raghavan Email cc Subject Attached Files Attached is the DealBench linking agreement together with a blackline against the agreement proposed by Envera for EOL From DealBenchs perspective this agreement is ready to be forwarded to Envera Please call with any questions or concerns Regards Dean Dean Harvey Vinson Elkins LLP Congress Avenue Suite Austin Texas ph fax CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE The information in this email may be confidential andor privileged This email is intended to be reviewed by only the individual or organization named above If you are not the intended recipient or an authorized representative of the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any review dissemination or copying of this email and its attachments if any or the information contained herein is prohibited If you have received this email in error please immediately notify the sender by return email and delete this email from your system Thank You v DOC DealBench Linking AgreementDOC v DOC DealBench Linking AgreementDOC
